price: 199 Montre-toi indulgent, incite les hommes à la vertu et détourne-toi des ignorants.
arabic: خُذِ ٱلۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: khudhi al-ʿafwa wamur bil-ʿur'fi wa-aʿriḍ ʿani al-jāhilīna
